notes.text:
Don't overcook - salmon should be slightly pink in center
Let salmon come to room temperature before cooking
Crispy skin is delicious - don't skip it

steps.descr: Preheat grill or pan to medium-high heat

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by preheating your grill or pan to medium-high heat. You want it nice and hot!

steps.instructions: Preheat grill or pan to medium-high heat

steps.descr: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper

on_enter.say: Now, let's mix together the olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper. Give it a good stir!

steps.instructions: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper

on_enter.say: Lovely! Now, brush that beautiful salmon with the marinade we just made. Make sure it's well coated.
Time to grill! Place the salmon skin-side down and let it cook for 5 minutes. You'll hear it sizzle and the skin will start to crisp up beautifully.

steps.descr: Flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Now flip the salmon and cook for another 3 to 4 minutes. The aroma will be amazing!

steps.instructions: Flip and cook for another 3-4 minutes

steps.descr: Top with fresh dill and lemon slices

on_enter.say: Let's finish it off by topping the salmon with fresh dill and lemon slices. It adds a lovely fresh flavor!

steps.instructions: Top with fresh dill and lemon slices

on_enter.say: Time to serve up this gorgeous dish with some roasted asparagus. Enjoy your meal!

recipe.title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon
recipe.description: Perfectly grilled salmon with fresh herbs and citrus
